text:
I'd find it useful if the existing download target was split into separate "get"
and "build" targets. This would allow me to build tomcat-dbcp.jar and
tomcat-jdt.jar when local copies of commons-dbcp, commons-pool,
commons-collections, and eclipse-JDT are available without the chance of
unexpectedly invoking Ant's HTTP client.

creator: celving@netflix.com
text:
Created attachment 20572
Split the download target into separate download-get and download-build targets
Whilst this specific patch wasn't applied, various changes to the build files have been made which now make it possible to do a complete off-line build, including of the extras package.
